front.title: RTP Payload Format for MPEG-4 FlexMultiplexed Streams

abstract.t: MPEG-4 is a recent standard from ISO/IEC for the coding of natural and synthetic audio-visual data.This document describes a payload format for transporting MPEG-4 synchronised and multiplexed data using RTP. Several services provided by RTP are beneficial for MPEG-4 encoded and multiplexed data transport over the Internet. Additionally, the use of RTP makes it possible to synchronize MPEG-4 data with other real-time data types.
